original_text: They have already turned away from my commands. They have made for themselves an image of a calf. They have bent down low to worship it. They have made sacrifices to give it honour. They are saying, “This is the god of the Israelites, the god who brought us out of Egypt!” ’
korean_text: 그들이 내가 그들에게 명령한 길을 속히 떠나 자기를 위하여 송아지를 부어 만들고 그것을 예배하며 그것에게 제물을 드리며 말하기를 이스라엘아 이는 너희를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 너희 신이라 하였도다

sentences.original_text: They have already turned away from my commands.
They have made for themselves an image of a calf.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들을 위해 송아지 형상을 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They have bent down low to worship it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것을 경배하기 위해 몸을 낮추었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They have made sacrifices to give it honour.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것에게 영광을 주기 위해 제물을 바쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: “This is the god of the Israelites,
the god who brought us out of Egypt!
